https://tmrev.io/movie/327324-A Day in Smara 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The documentary tells the story of one day in Smara, a refugee camp in the south of Algeria. A handmade symbolic toke takes us through the lives of six characters and the reality of the situation in Sahara: The past, present and future of a population without land who want that their words will be heard by the world. A Day in Smara
